content: shawl measures 77 wide across top edge x 34 long not including fringe gauge 1 pattern repeat = 9½ 6 row = 4 notes one pattern repeat consists of a pineapple pattern at its widest and the surrounding chain-spaces and shells chart 1 video tutorial for the shawl 2 video tutorial for a chart 3 also available on the red heart united kingdom 4 and red heart deutschland 5 websites on red heart north america site pattern is in us crochet terms on red heart united kingdom site pattern is in uk crochet terms en español 6 1 http //www marlybird com/how-to-read-sidewalk-shawl-crochet-chart/ 2 http //www redheart com/lean/videos/how-to-crochet-sidewalk-shawl 3 http //www redheart com/learn/videos/how-to-read-sidewalk-shawl-crochet-chart 4 http //www redheart co uk/free-patterns/sidewalk-shawl 5 http //www redheart de/free-patterns/schal-zum-ausgehen 6 http //www redheart mx/instrucciones-gratis/chalina-con-hojas
